description: Configuration for MCP schema discovery. Copy this to discovery-config.json and customize with your own project names, work item IDs, etc.

ado.description: Azure DevOps MCP server - configure safe read-only tools here

wit_get_work_item.description: Get work item details - discovers the structure of work items with all fields and relations

search_workitem.description: Search for work items - discovers the search result structure

wit_list_backlogs.description: List backlogs - discovers backlog metadata structure

wit_list_backlog_work_items.description: List work items in a backlog - discovers work item list structure

core_list_projects.description: List all projects - discovers project structure

core_list_project_teams.description: List teams in a project - discovers team structure

pipelines_get_build_definitions.description: List build definitions - discovers pipeline definition structure

dangerousTools._comment: These tools are listed here as a reminder - they should NEVER be added to safeTools

sequential-thinking.description: Sequential thinking MCP server - generally safe but may consume tokens

safeTools._comment: Add tools here if you want to discover their schemas

options.description: All discovered fields will be marked as optional since API responses vary by context, permissions, and work item types
